description: {"blocks":[{"key":"71r3j","text":"This protocol details about 3D mesh cleanup tutorial of fossil crab (Advanced).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b6m1","text":"Skills developed: Advanced mesh editing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fdn9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69iuv","text":"3D meshes of fossil specimens extracted directly from 3D imaging data often need post-processing to be useful for paleontological analyses. Here, we present the workflow that was used to digitally process Cretapsara athanata (Luque et al. 2021), the most complete fossil crab ever discovered, as a tutorial. This tutorial uses two pieces of software: the opensource mesh editing program Meshlab (Meshlab.net) and the 3D modeling software Autodesk Maya (autodesk.com/products/maya) that can be downloaded for free by students or through an institutional subscription. It is highly recommended that the first two tutorials in this series are completed before beginning this one. Note that this tutorial utilizes Meshlab 2021.10 and Autodesk Maya 2017, and other versions may have slightly different layouts and functions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":205,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akcgf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aukq4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50q32","text":"When the digitized fossil crab was first exported as a mesh from the 3D processing software, a number of common issues were evident. The right eye is missing, a leg is detatched, tips of the claws are floating, isolated faces, and debris surround and abut the specimen. This tutorial will walk through how to rectify these issues. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a2m2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"66635060C26A11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":408,"id":352659,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2nxbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2nvbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2nwbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2nubn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}
keywords: Remove External Debris, 3D mesh cleanup tutorial, Fill Holes

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"couji","text":"Import the crab into Meshlab by following Part 1 in the Cupule Cleanup Tutorial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"embac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j5bg","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b1fis","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8ADB8E80C26A11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":352678,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pjbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pgbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2pibn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pebn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akttp","text":"The imported mesh includes the crab, but it also includes other small isolated meshes that are 3D reconstructions of bits of the matrix. Remove this external debris by running a filter that removes small isolated mesh particles. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g8ps","text":"Go to Filters \u003e Remeshing, Simplification and Reconstruction \u003e Remove isolated pieces with respect to face number. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":44},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mrl2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ksqj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a1lh4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C532B4F0C26A11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":352691,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pzbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pvbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2pxbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2pubn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vp7p","text":"This option may be under “Cleaning and Repairing” in other versions of the software. As the 3D mesh of the crab is a large connected mesh with a relatively high number of faces, start by removing meshes with a relatively small number of faces (e.g., 200) and increase incrementally (e.g., by 50-500) until the bulk of the isolated extraneous mesh pieces are removed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97mse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39rcr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ahj","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evmap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E109EF40C26A11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":338,"id":352704,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qebn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qabn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2qdbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2p8bn3x7.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"096B51A0C26F11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":352716,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qtbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qnbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2qsbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qkbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjjhd","text":"The scene still contains a few relatively large bits of extraneous isolated meshes. To select and delete these faces manually, first click on the Interactive Selection tool in the top right of the icon-based menu. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":133,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"faffv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ertr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6veml","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"45ilk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04F6B640C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":77,"id":352733,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2q9bn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2q7bn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2q8bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2q6bn3x7.webp","width":87}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0E4ADD70C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":38,"id":352726,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2q3bn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qybn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2q2bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2qwbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4h7v","text":"Hold left click and drag your cursor to select faces. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i8lo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dql6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l5td","text":"To add faces to your selection, hold command (Mac) or ctrl (PC) while you left click and drag. To delete faces from your selection, hold shift while you left click and drag. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":29},{"style":"bold","offset":132,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qc4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14smd","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agc47","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4jg4m","text":"Note that, while this tool is on, the faces you selected previously will become deselected once you click somewhere else in the project window. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1B3B8C50C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":341,"id":352749,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2rxbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2rpbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2rwbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2rnbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4js7","text":"Delete these faces by deselecting the Interactive Selection tool and selecting“Delete Selected Faces and Vertices” on the right of the icon-based menu.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":42},{"style":"bold","offset":69,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84q63","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"r3v2","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1f9t6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24d0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2F4A6F90C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":73,"id":352783,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sxbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2srbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2subn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sqbn3x7.webp","width":87}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"35A57B00C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":34,"id":352763,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sabn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2r5bn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2r8bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2r2bn3x7.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CE15AE50C26B11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":352775,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sjbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2shbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2sibn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sgbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pa31","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fujd","text":"Next, repeat these steps to select and delete the small, rounded pebbles that are touching the crab mesh. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tppf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3q8t6","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"49q9k","text":"Note that your selection goes through the entire mesh in that plane of view. Be sure to minimize the number of faces of the crab mesh itself that are deleted; this can be done by turning off the Interactive Selection tool","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"54b7a","text":" ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7rl5r","text":"and rotating the mesh to ensure no pieces of the crab mesh were accidentally selected before deleting mesh components. We recommend duplicating the mesh, as Meshlab does not have an undo function, in case desired components of the mesh are accidentally deleted or deselected.  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fbs7t","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"5D6EE320C26F11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":89.65517241379311,"id":352791,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kx5gbn3x7.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2szbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2sybn3x7.webp","width":100},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"image"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f7t9","text":"Clean up the mesh by selecting Filters \u003e Remeshing, Simplification and Reconstruction \u003e Repair non Manifold edges. Select Remove Faces and click Apply. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":44},{"style":"bold","offset":88,"length":25},{"style":"bold","offset":115,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":139,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btva5","text":"Close holes that formed in the crab mesh during the deletion of articulating debris by selecting Filters \u003eRemeshing, Simplification and Reconstruction \u003e Close Holes. Set “Max size to be closed” to 500 and select Apply. Alternatively, holes can be patched via the sculpting method described in the previous tutorial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":97,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":106,"length":44},{"style":"bold","offset":153,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":170,"length":30},{"style":"bold","offset":205,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tg66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90mrc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"loko","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5eddg","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cf3hb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D96A1580C26F11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":341,"id":352801,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2tdbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2tbbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2tcbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2tabn3x7.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"196E9F10C26C11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":321,"id":352813,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2trbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2tpbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2tqbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2tnbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17bp7","text":"Deselect everything by selecting Filters \u003e Selection \u003e Select None. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":43,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":55,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26hju","text":"Now, we’re going to shrinkwrap a copy of the crab mesh to fill the leftover holes and smooth the surface of the crab. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nuro","text":"The first step to do this is to hollow out the inside of the mesh. Duplicate the mesh and select Filters \u003e Color Creation and Processing \u003e Ambient Occlusion. Keep default settings selected click “okay” on the popup window. This tags the external faces white and internal faces dark. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":97,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":30},{"style":"bold","offset":139,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":189,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rnak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arp2j","text":"Select Filters \u003e Remeshing Simplification and Reconstruction \u003e Surface Reconstruction: Screened Poisson.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":43},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rpb2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lri9","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4udum","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3DB19C60C26C11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":319,"id":352825,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2t5bn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2t3bn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2t4bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2t2bn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dbm8","text":"Check “Pre-Clean” and click Apply.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd4j9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5klt5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"78pf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4A18A8E0C26C11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":320,"id":352837,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2uhbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2ufbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2ugbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2uebn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hsqk","text":"This new version of the mesh has filled holes and a smooth surface; however, some detail has been removed. Merge the new Poisson mesh with the mesh saved previously by making these two meshes visible and hiding any others by selecting the eye icon. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pirb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7du3i","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4cums","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11DBD070C3EC11ED8CE7F3CF1321F9CC","height":320,"id":352849,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2uvbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2utbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k2uubn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k2usbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6nv2","text":"To mirror the eye, first, select the scale icon on the left:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fao2v","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6sk4p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D5F8CE70C26D11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":81,"id":353041,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k22xbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k22tbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k22wbn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k22sbn3x7.webp","width":85}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"coihl","text":"Click the icon to the right of the X, Y, Z in the first icon-based menu at the top of the screen and set to “Relative transform”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2s2p","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fp73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E0BFE690C26D11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":67,"id":353047,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k223bn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k22zbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k222bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k22ybn3x7.webp","width":414}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8lb3j","text":"Type -1 into the Z box and push “Enter”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hak","text":"Select the newly mirrored eye and move to the correct location on the crab using the transform and rotate tools. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dti0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"46toe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en2p5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqlbt","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4nt8u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"15l5s","text":"Hint: it helps to move the pivot by selecting the eye and selecting Modify – Center Pivot in the top menu.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FBC4B5B0C26D11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":370,"id":353055,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23cbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k229bn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k23abn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k228bn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bicr6","text":"Next, select all mesh components by clicking the selection icon, holding left click and dragging the cursor over all of the objects. Command A also works. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eu0a","text":"Select Mesh – Combine in the first menu at the top to merge all mesh components together. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnbvu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qudl","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rubv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0CBE42A0C26E11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":371,"id":353063,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23jbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23hbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k23ibn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23gbn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhdu2","text":"Repeat the Repair Missing Elements protocol for the eyes to fix the tip of the claws and legs. Congratulations on making a beautiful crab! ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kclo","text":"Duplicate the mesh by right clicking the file name and selecting “Duplicate the Current Layer.” Select the eye icon on the original layer to toggle visibility so you can see deletions on the new layer more clearly. You may wish to delete extraneous mesh little-by-little as you are just beginning, as opposed to all at once (as shown in the image below). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":28},{"style":"bold","offset":55,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo1el","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5clld","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2evng","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a0bv6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9070BFA0C26F11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":353071,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23vbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23rbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k23ubn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23qbn3x7.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A76E8570C26F11ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":339,"id":353079,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k234bn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23zbn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k233bn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k23ybn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fqep","text":"Then, remove small isolated pieces that might have been formed during previous steps repeating Filters \u003e Remeshing, Simplification and Reconstruction \u003e Remove isolated pieces with respect to face number. Save this mesh layer by duplicating it. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":95,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":105,"length":44},{"style":"bold","offset":152,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hr4m","text":"Next, select Filters \u003e Selection\u003e Select by Vertex Quality. Check preview selection. Move the sliders to set Min and Max to optimize the highest number of internal faces and minimal external ones (e.g., Min at 0 and Max at 0.132944) (review cupule tutorial for details). Click “Apply.”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":24},{"style":"bold","offset":60,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":36},{"style":"bold","offset":195,"length":38},{"style":"bold","offset":269,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rl7m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em4jo","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73eo7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2A5172E0C27011ED9E130F0AA522A292","height":320,"id":353087,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k24bbn3x7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k239bn3x7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k24abn3x7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k238bn3x7.webp","width":550}}}}
